extendedInfo.description: The Holdem Poker Hand Evaluator calculates the odds of winning a 1v1 poker hand.  The calculation takes about 15-20 seconds and displays the results on the screen.  The application is very easy to use and is perfect for when a player wants to know if he was ahead or behind during a hand.  You can enter only the hole cards or you can add the flop and turn.  Perfect for use in casinos because it does not require the internet to calculate the results!

reviews.title: I Won
reviews.comment: What a great application finally won big using it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exciting!!!
reviews.comment: This app really helps out players who are trying to master the odds
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best free poker evaluator
reviews.comment: Love that it works in casinos where I don\'t have internet access! Very simple and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User
